channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 贾德森给山东队带来亚冠输给川崎的希望
item.description: Kawasaki Frontale will take a one-goal lead into the second leg of their Asian Champions League last 16 meeting with China's Shandong Taishan next week with the Japanese side edging a five-goal thriller 3-2 in Jinan on Tuesday.翻译:川崎前锋将以一球领先的优势进入亚冠联赛16强次回合比赛，下周将与中国山东泰山队交锋，周二，日本队在济南以5球3-2险胜对手。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 克里：特朗普无法阻止绿色能源革命，但中国煤炭威胁迫在眉睫
item.description: A re-elected Donald Trump won't stop renewable energy deployment, but could reverse anti-coal diplomacy efforts, U.S. Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry said on Tuesday at the International Energy Agency ministerial gathering.翻译:美国总统气候特使约翰·克里周二在国际能源机构部长级会议上表示，连任的唐纳德·特朗普不会停止可再生能源部署，但可能会扭转反煤炭外交努力。
item.author: Julia Payne, America Hernandez

item.title: 早盘竞价：日经指数和纳斯达克指数创纪录，CPI 潜伏
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：印度IT部担心在智能手机出口竞赛中输给中国和越南
item.description: India risks losing out to China and Vietnam as it seeks to become a major smartphone export hub and must "act fast" to lure global companies with lower tariffs, the deputy IT minister said in government documents seen by Reuters.翻译:印度信息技术部副部长​​在路透社看到的政府文件中表示，印度在寻求成为主要智能手机出口中心时面临着输给中国和越南的风险，必须“迅速采取行动”以较低关税吸引全球企业。
item.author: Aditya Kalra, Munsif Vengattil

item.title: 澳大利亚贸易部长要求中国解除壁垒，质疑王判刑
item.description: Australia's trade minister said on Tuesday he would meet his Chinese counterpart at a World Trade Organization conference in Abu Dhabi this month and push for the removal of restrictions on imported Australian wine, lobsters and meat.翻译:澳大利亚贸易部长周二表示，他将于本月在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织会议上与中国贸易部长会面，并推动取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒、龙虾和肉类的进口限制。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 领先军事研究中心表示，俄罗斯在乌克兰损失 3000 辆坦克后依赖旧库存
item.description: Russia has lost more than 3,000 tanks during its invasion of Ukraine - the equivalent of its entire pre-war active inventory - but has enough lower-quality armoured vehicles in storage for years of replacements, a leading research centre said Tuesday.翻译:一家领先的研究中心周二表示，俄罗斯在入侵乌克兰期间损失了 3000 多辆坦克，相当于其战前的全部现役坦克库存，但仍储备有足够的低质量装甲车供多年替换。
item.author: Greg Torode

item.title: 去年法国葡萄酒和烈酒出口因美国宿醉而下降
item.description: French exports of wine and spirits fell last year from a post-COVID peak as inflation clipped consumer demand and distributors in the lucrative U.S. market cleared existing stocks, industry group FEVS said.翻译:行业组织 FEVS 表示，去年法国葡萄酒和烈酒出口量从新冠疫情后的峰值下降，原因是通货膨胀削弱了消费者需求，而且利润丰厚的美国市场的经销商清理了现有库存。
item.author: Gus Trompiz

item.title: 看涨投资者自 2022 年 4 月以来首次放弃衰退预测
item.description: Global investors are at their most bullish in two years this month and no longer expect a recession, as confidence grows in the resilience of the underlying economy, a Bank of America survey showed on Tuesday.翻译:美国银行周二的一项调查显示，随着对基础经济弹性的信心增强，全球投资者本月处于两年来最乐观的状态，不再预期经济会出现衰退。
item.author: Danilo Masoni, Amanda Cooper

item.title: 图瓦卢选举结果推迟凸显气候影响
item.description: An election result in Tuvalu has been delayed by two weeks as dangerous weather stops boats from bringing new lawmakers to the capital to vote for prime minister, highlighting why climate change is the top political issue in the Pacific Islands nation.翻译:图瓦卢的选举结果被推迟两周，因为危险的天气导致船只无法将新议员带到首都投票选举总理，这凸显了为什么气候变化是这个太平洋岛国的首要政治问题。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 印度在MSCI关键指数中缩小与中国的差距，权重再创新高
item.description: India has narrowed the gap with China in MSCI's Global Standard index, which tracks emerging market stocks for investors, after the latest revision.翻译:在最新修订后，印度在摩根士丹利资本国际全球标准指数（该指数为投资者追踪新兴市场股票）中缩小了与中国的差距。
item.author: Bharath Rajeswaran

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布后，股市暴跌，美元上涨
item.description: European stocks and S&P 500 futures slid on Tuesday, extending their losses, after data showed U.S. inflation slowed less than expected in January.翻译:数据显示 1 月份美国通胀放缓幅度低于预期，欧洲股市和标准普尔 500 指数期货周二下跌，扩大跌幅。
item.author: Harry Robertson

item.title: 通胀数据公布后美元上涨，触及150日元
item.description: The dollar turned higher on Tuesday, hitting 150 against the yen for the first time since November, after data showed U.S. inflation rose more than expected in January, reinforcing expectations that the Federal Reserve will hold interest rates in March.翻译:美元周二走高，兑日元自11月以来首次触及150，此前数据显示美国1月份通胀升幅超出预期，强化了美联储将在3月份维持利率不变的预期。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘买盘：日元兑美元接近 150 十字路口
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 沃伦·巴菲特 Squishmallows 的制造商 Build-A-Bear 在法庭上对峙
item.description: Warren Buffett is taking on Build-A-Bear.翻译:沃伦·巴菲特正在挑战“Build-A-Bear”。
item.author: Jonathan Stempel

item.title: 美国议员呼吁对中国药明康德生物技术公司实施制裁
item.description: The U.S. should review Chinese biotech firm WuXi AppTec and its affiliate WuXi Biologics for sanctions, a bipartisan group of lawmakers told top Biden administration officials on Monday.翻译:两党议员周一告诉拜登政府高级官员，美国应审查中国生物技术公司药明康德及其附属公司药明生物的制裁。
item.author: Michael Martina

item.title: 民主党参议员对拜登竞选加入 TikTok 的决定表示担忧
item.description: The chair of the Senate Intelligence Committee said on Monday he is concerned about the decision by the campaign of President Joe Biden to join short-video app TikTok, while the White House said nothing has changed about government national security concerns.翻译:参议院情报委员会主席周一表示，他对乔·拜登总统竞选团队加入短视频应用 TikTok 的决定感到担忧，而白宫表示，政府对国家安全的担忧没有任何改变。
item.author: David Shepardson, Trevor Hunnicutt

item.title: 比特币两年多来首次触及 5 万美元水平
item.description: Bitcoin hit the $50,000 level for the first time in more than two years as the world's largest cryptocurrency was buoyed by expectations of interest rate cuts later this year and last month's regulatory nod for U.S. exchange-traded funds designed to track its price.翻译:比特币两年多来首次触及 50,000 美元的水平，全球最大的加密货币受到今年晚些时候降息的预期以及上个月监管机构对旨在跟踪其价格的美国交易所交易基金的认可的提振。
item.author: Hannah Lang, Elizabeth Howcroft

item.title: 早盘竞价：5,000 个乐观的理由
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.翻译:阿曼达·库珀 (Amanda Cooper) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 马克龙任命前能源署署长为未来亚欧走廊特使
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron named the former head of gas utility Engie as its special envoy to a multinational rail and ports project linking the Middle East and South Asia tipped as an alternative to China's Belt and Road initiative.翻译:法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙任命天然气公司前负责人恩吉为连接中东和南亚的跨国铁路和港口项目的特使，该项目被认为是中国“一带一路”倡议的替代方案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：小米称印度对中国企业的审查令供应商感到不安
item.description: China's Xiaomi has told the Indian government that its heavy scrutiny of Chinese companies has made smartphone component suppliers wary about setting up operations in India, according to a letter and a source with direct knowledge of the matter.翻译:据一封信函和一位直接了解情况的消息人士透露，中国小米已向印度政府表示，其对中国公司的严格审查使得智能手机零部件供应商对在印度设立业务持谨慎态度。
item.author: Aditya Kalra, Munsif Vengattil
